item.title: Command history
item.description: Linux Command history can be found /~.bash_history. Make sure to check variant for other such as zsh, fish, etc. Also, the history command can be used. Windows cmd doskey /history Powershell PowerShell command history can be found in : Users\$name\appdata\roaming\Microsoft\Windows\PowerShell\PSReadline then gc ConsoleHost_history.txt You can also try Get-History | Format-List -Property *
